import React from "react"; import { Link, useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import products from "../products"; import { Col, Row, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import Tab from "react-bootstrap/Tab"; import Tabs from "react-bootstrap/Tabs"; import Rating from "../components/Rating"; const ProductScreen = () => { const { id: productId } = useParams(); const product = products.find((product) => product._id === productId); console.log(product); return ( <> Go Back

{product.name}

 Description: {product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? "In stock" : "Out of stock"} Tab content for Home Tab content for Profile Tab content for Contact ); }; export default ProductScreen;
